description: Deterministic L1 top-company rollup from L3 company mappings and competitiveness scores.

method.confidence_factor: max(0, 1 - confidence_penalty); fallback by confidence_tier {A:0.85, B:0.55, C:0.25}
method.aggregation: per L1, aggregate company weighted_score as sum across mapped L3 components
method.ranking: weighted_score_sum desc, component_count desc, company_name asc
